summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6121 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 40, as laid off by D. T. Denny, Guardian of the estate of J. H. Nagle (commonly known as Nagle's Addition), as established by Ordinance No. 5236, being the alley between 14th Avenue North and 15th Avenue North from East Denny Way to East Howell Street; and certain other streets, avenues, and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 84815, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
